targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_s3_bucket
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_lambda_function
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_application_load_balancer
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_user
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT region) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance

panels.title: üö® Ïù∏ÌîÑÎùº ÏïåÎ¶º Î∞è ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜå (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance WHERE instance_state = 'stopped'
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance WHERE publicly_accessible = true
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume WHERE encrypted = false
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance WHERE tags = '{}'::jsonb OR tags->>'Name' IS NULL

panels.description: SSH Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ Ïò§ÌîàÎêú Î≥¥Ïïà Í∑∏Î£π (ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏúÑÌóò)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT group_id) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_security_group_rule WHERE type = 'ingress' AND from_port = 22 AND to_port = 22 AND cidr_ipv4 = '0.0.0.0/0'

panels.title: üö® SSH Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ Ïò§Ìîà (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_iam_access_key WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT region as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance GROUP BY region ORDER BY value DESC
SELECT region as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance GROUP BY region ORDER BY value DESC

panels.description: EC2 Ïù∏Ïä§ÌÑ¥Ïä§ ÌÉÄÏûÖÎ≥Ñ Î∂ÑÌè¨ (ÎπÑÏö© ÏµúÏ†ÅÌôî Ï∞∏Í≥†)

targets.rawSql: SELECT instance_type as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance GROUP BY instance_type ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: üíª EC2 Ïù∏Ïä§ÌÑ¥Ïä§ ÌÉÄÏûÖÎ≥Ñ Î∂ÑÌè¨ (ÏÉÅÏúÑ 10Í∞ú) (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql: SELECT engine as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance GROUP BY engine ORDER BY value DESC

panels.description: Ï¶âÏãú Ï°∞ÏπòÍ∞Ä ÌïÑÏöîÌïú Î≥¥Ïïà ÏúÑÌóò Î¶¨ÏÜåÏä§

targets.rawSql:
-- Î≥¥Ïïà ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜå Ï¢ÖÌï©
SELECT * FROM (
  SELECT 
    'EC2 Instance' as resource_type,
    instance_id as resource_id,
    'SSH Open to 0.0.0.0/0' as issue,
    'HIGH' as risk_level,
    region,
    placement_availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance ec2
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM ${account_connection}.aws_vpc_security_group_rule sgr
    WHERE sgr.group_id = ANY(
      SELECT jsonb_array_elements_text(
        jsonb_path_query_array(ec2.security_groups, '$[*].GroupId')
      )
    )
    AND sgr.type = 'ingress' 
    AND sgr.from_port <= 22 
    AND sgr.to_port >= 22 
    AND sgr.cidr_ipv4 = '0.0.0.0/0'
  )

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    'RDS Instance' as resource_type,
    db_instance_identifier as resource_id,
    'Publicly Accessible' as issue,
    'HIGH' as risk_level,
    region,
    availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
  WHERE publicly_accessible = true

  UNION ALL

  SELECT 
    'EBS Volume' as resource_type,
    volume_id as resource_id,
    'Not Encrypted' as issue,
    'MEDIUM' as risk_level,
    region,
    availability_zone as az
  FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume 
  WHERE encrypted = false
) security_risks
ORDER BY 
  CASE risk_level 
    WHEN 'HIGH' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'MEDIUM' THEN 2 
    WHEN 'LOW' THEN 3 
  END,
  resource_type

panels.title: üö® Î≥¥Ïïà ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜå (Ï¶âÏãú Ï°∞Ïπò ÌïÑÏöî) (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

panels.description: ÌÉúÍ∑∏ Ï†ïÏ±Ö ÏúÑÎ∞ò Î∞è Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ Ïù¥Ïäà

targets.rawSql:
-- ÌÉúÍ∑∏ Ï†ïÏ±Ö Ï§ÄÏàò ÌòÑÌô©
SELECT 
  'EC2' as resource_type,
  instance_id as resource_id,
  instance_type,
  instance_state,
  CASE 
    WHEN tags->>'Name' IS NOT NULL AND tags->>'Name' != '' THEN true
    ELSE false 
  END as has_name_tag,
  tags->>'Environment' as environment_tag,
  tags->>'Owner' as owner_tag,
  region,
  launch_time::date as created_date
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_instance 
ORDER BY has_name_tag, launch_time DESC
LIMIT 50

panels.title: üè∑Ô∏è ÌÉúÍ∑∏ Ï†ïÏ±Ö Ï§ÄÏàò ÌòÑÌô© (ÏµúÍ∑º 50Í∞ú Î¶¨ÏÜåÏä§) (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_snapshot WHERE state = 'completed'

panels.description: RDS ÏûêÎèô Î∞±ÏóÖÏù¥ ÌôúÏÑ±ÌôîÎêú Ïù∏Ïä§ÌÑ¥Ïä§ Ïàò

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance WHERE backup_retention_period > 0

panels.title: üîÑ RDS ÏûêÎèô Î∞±ÏóÖ (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_snapshot WHERE start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days' AND state = 'completed'
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ec2_ami WHERE state = 'available' AND owner_id != 'amazon'

SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume v WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_snapshot s WHERE s.volume_id = v.volume_id AND s.start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days')
SELECT COUNT(*) as value FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance WHERE backup_retention_period = 0

SELECT 
  start_time::date as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_snapshot 
WHERE start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
  AND state = 'completed'
GROUP BY start_time::date 
ORDER BY start_time::date

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN backup_retention_period = 0 THEN '‚ùå Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏóÜÏùå'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 7 THEN 'üü° 1-7Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 14 THEN 'üü† 8-14Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 30 THEN 'üü¢ 15-30Ïùº'
    ELSE 'üîµ 30Ïùº+'
  END as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN backup_retention_period = 0 THEN '‚ùå Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏóÜÏùå'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 7 THEN 'üü° 1-7Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 14 THEN 'üü† 8-14Ïùº'
    WHEN backup_retention_period <= 30 THEN 'üü¢ 15-30Ïùº'
    ELSE 'üîµ 30Ïùº+'
  END
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.title: üóÑÔ∏è RDS Î∞±ÏóÖ Î≥¥Ï°¥ Í∏∞Í∞Ñ Î∂ÑÌè¨ (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

targets.rawSql:
-- Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜå Ï¢ÖÌï©
SELECT 
  'RDS Instance' as resource_type,
  db_instance_identifier as resource_id,
  'No Automatic Backup' as issue,
  'HIGH' as risk_level,
  'Enable automated backups' as recommendation,
  region,
  availability_zone as az
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_rds_db_instance 
WHERE backup_retention_period = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'EBS Volume' as resource_type,
  v.volume_id as resource_id,
  'No Recent Snapshot' as issue,
  'MEDIUM' as risk_level,
  'Create EBS snapshot' as recommendation,
  v.region,
  v.availability_zone as az
FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_volume v 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 FROM ${account_connection}.aws_ebs_snapshot s 
  WHERE s.volume_id = v.volume_id 
    AND s.start_time >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
    AND s.state = 'completed'
)
AND v.state = 'in-use'
ORDER BY 
  CASE risk_level 
    WHEN 'HIGH' THEN 1 
    WHEN 'MEDIUM' THEN 2 
  END,
  resource_type
LIMIT 50

panels.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Î∞±ÏóÖ ÏúÑÌóò ÏöîÏÜå Î∞è Í∂åÏû•ÏÇ¨Ìï≠ (Variable Î∞©Ïãù)

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name as __value, CASE WHEN schema_name = 'aws_estaid' THEN 'Account 1' WHEN schema_name = 'aws_test_fnf' THEN 'Account 2' ELSE schema_name END as __text FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name LIKE 'aws_%' AND schema_name != 'aws_compliance' ORDER BY schema_name
list.label: Account
list.name: account_connection
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT schema_name as __value, CASE WHEN schema_name = 'aws_estaid' THEN 'Account 1' WHEN schema_name = 'aws_test_fnf' THEN 'Account 2' ELSE schema_name END as __text FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name LIKE 'aws_%' AND schema_name != 'aws_compliance' ORDER BY schema_name
